trans-unit.source: Contains methods and fields for UI Automation client applications.
Registers a method that handles [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] events.
Some classes, such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.GridPattern>, expose fields identifying events that are specific to the class.
The AddAutomationEventHandler method provides a mechanism that enables you to register handlers for these events.
`eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
The identifier for the event the method will handle.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to associate with the event handler.
The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.
The method to call when the specified event occurs.
Registers a method that will handle focus-changed events.
Focus-changed events are system-wide; you cannot set a narrower scope.
`eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
The method to call when the event occurs.
Registers a method that will handle property-changed events.

The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] item specified by the supplied [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element might not support the properties specified by the `properties` parameter.
`eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element with which to associate the event handler.
The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and children.
The method to call when the event occurs.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] properties of interest.
Registers the method that will handle structure-changed events.
`eventHandler` can be an instance of the method, or a reference to the method (`AddressOf` in Visual Basic).
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element with which to associate the event handler.
The scope of events to be handled; that is, whether they are on the element itself, or on its ancestors and descendants.
The method to call when the structure-changed event occurs.
Compares two integer arrays containing run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] to determine whether their content is the same.

If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), Compare throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> exception.
The first run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to compare.
The second run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-id-md.md)] to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the compared run-time [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_id#plural](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-idsharpplural-md.md)] refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_ui](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-ui-md.md)] element; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Compares two [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements, returning <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if both refer to the same [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] element.

If either of the arguments is a null reference (`Nothing` in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]), <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.Compare%2A> throws an <xref:System.ArgumentNullException> exception.
This method is equivalent to the equality operator for <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> objects.
The first [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.
The second [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element to compare.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the run time identifiers of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_ui](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] elements are the same; otherwise <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that can contain content.
To be added.

Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes only [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements that are controls.
To be added.
Retrieves the name of the specified control pattern.
The identifier of the control pattern.

The friendly name of the control pattern, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified pattern is not found.
Retrieves the name of the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property identifier of the named property.

The friendly name of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property, or a null reference (<xref uid="langword_csharp_Nothing" name="Nothing" href=""></xref> in [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_visualbnet](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-visualbnet-md.md)]) if the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property is not found.

Represents a predefined view of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] tree that includes all [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] elements.
Used by itself, this condition is functionally identical to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Condition>.
To be added.
Removes all registered [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handlers.
Removes the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] event handler.
An event identifier.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element on which to remove the event handler.

The handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationEventHandler*> for the specified event identifier and [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
Removes the specified focus-changed event handler.
The following example code shows a focus-changed event handler being added and removed.
[!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#102](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/ClientForm.vb#102)] [!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#102](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/ClientForm.cs#102)]
A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationFocusChangedEventHandler*>
Removes the specified property-changed event handler.
The following example code shows a property-changed event handler being added and removed.
[!code-cs[UIAClient_snip#172](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/CustomElementClient/PropertySnips.cs#172)] [!code-vb[UIAClient_snip#172](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/UIAClient_snip/PropertySnips.vb#172)]
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element from which to remove the event handler.

A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddAutomationPropertyChangedEventHandler*> for the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
Removes the specified structure-changed event handler.
The [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element from which to remove the event handler.

A handler method that was passed to <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Automation.AddStructureChangedEventHandler*> for the specified [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element.
